title: Crispy Tofu Bowl
directions: Slice tofu 1/4 inch thick. Place on cutting board between paper towels;
top with baking sheet. Top with large cans or
other weight; let stand 10 minutes. Soak red onion in cold water.
Whisk red wine vinegar and Thai sweet chili sauce, olive oil and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Pat onion dry; toss with half of vinaigrette
Sprinkle tofu on both sides with cornstarch. In 12-inch skillet, heat vegetable oil on medium-high until
hot. Carefully add tofu. Cook until deep
golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Drain
Divide quinoa among 4 bowls. Top each with salad, roasted cashew
ingredients: 1/2 small red onion, very thinly sliced
